renderpass.code:
/*###*/void
          mainImage(out vec4
       Q,in vec2 W){float s=sin(
     iTime),c=cos(iTime),n=1.-c,o=
    .7,k=o*o;vec3 R=iResolution, d=
   normalize(vec3(floor((W.xy-vec2((
  R.x-R.y)*.5,0)       )/R.y*80.)/80.  
  -.5, 1)), C=           vec3(0);for(  
  int i=0;i<15           ;++i){vec4 D  
  =mat4(n*k+c,           n*k,o*s,0,n*  
  k,n*k+c,-o*s           ,0,-o*s,o*s,  
  c,0,0,0,0,0)*        vec4(C+vec3(0,
   0,-4),1);C+=d*(length(vec2(length
    (D.xz)-1.,D.y))-.4);}/**/Q=vec4(
     floor(vec3(2.-length(C)/2.5)
       *12.)/12.,1);}/*#########
         # made by @dkaraush #
             # dima.bio #*/
renderpass.name: Image
